name: String
Prayer of Healing
passive: Exhaust this card during your turn and choose yourself or an adjacent hero. Roll 1 red power die. The chosen hero recovers Heart equal to the Heart rolled.

name: String
Wooden Shield
action: Exhaust this card after rolling defense dice to add 1 Shield to the results; Effect:Shield:1

name: String
Armor of Faith
passive:
Each time you use Prayer of Healing on a hero, that hero adds 1 additional brown die to his defense pool until the start of your next turn.
Place a hero token belonging to that hero on this card as a reminder.

name: String
Blessed Strike
action: Perform an attack with a Melee weapon. If you deal at least 1 Heart (after rolling defense dice), you and 1 hero of your choice adjacent to you each recover 2 Heart.

name: String
Cleansing Touch
passive: Each time you use Prayer of Healing on a hero, that hero may also discard 1 of his Condition cards.

name: String
Divine Fury
passive:
Each time you use Prayer of Healing on a hero, that hero adds 1 additional yellow power die to his attack pool on his next attack this round.
Place a hero token belonging to that hero on this card as a reminder.

name: String
Prayer of Peace
passive: While this card is exhausted, monsters cannot perform an attack while adjacent to you.

name: String
Time of Need
action: You receive 2 movement points and recover 2 Fatigue.

name: String
Holy Power
passive: Your Prayer of Healing may now affect 2 different heroes. If you roll a Surge on the red power die when using Prayer of Healing, both heroes recover 1 Fatigue.

name: String
Radiant Light
action: Roll 1 red power die. Each hero in your line of sight (including yourself) recovers the amount of Heart rolled. Each monster in your line of sight suffers the amount of Heart rolled.
